An absolutely wonderful puzzle game, from the brilliantly designed levels, to the writing, there's not much I can criticise about the game. It's a joy to play through, and I'd even say that everyone should experience this at least once.

Great puzzle game. Laid the foundation for the much improved sequel. 

I can only see people getting stuck on the very last test chamber. Otherwise, the puzzles are pretty easy. Great song at the end.
11/10, intriguing story line, fun mechanics. What more could you ask for?

V社的经典之作，在今天看来传送门的玩法还是挺新颖的。
+精妙的关卡设计（同时我也很佩服传送门2的质量同样高）
+挑战关卡在交流中能看到不同玩家的奇思妙想和精巧操作
+《Still Alive》
This was a triumph.
I'm making a note here: HUGE SUCCESS.
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.
Aperture Science
We do what we must
Because we can.
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.
But there's no sense crying over every mistake.
You just keep on trying till you run out of cake.
And the Science gets done.
And you make a neat gun.
For the people who are still alive.
I'm not even angry.
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart.
And killed me.
And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you!
Now these points of data make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time.
So I'm GLaD. I got burned.
Think of all the things we learned
For the people who are still alive.
Go ahead and leave me.
I think I prefer to stay inside.
Maybe you'll find someone else to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa
THAT WAS A JOKE.
HAHA. FAT CHANCE.
Anyway, this cake is great.
It's so delicious and moist.
Look at me still talking
When there's Science to do.
When I look out there, it makes me GLaD I'm not you.
I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are still alive.
And believe me I am still alive.
I'm doing Science and I'm still alive.
I feel FANTASTIC and I'm still alive.
While you're dying I'll be still alive.
And when you're dead I will be still alive.
STILL ALIVE
Still alive.

Finally decided to try out Portal, after hearing so many good things about this 13-year-old game. It did not disappoint. With only 19 levels and a final boss, the game isn't incredibly long; it could probably be completed in one sitting, but this game is a true tour-de-force. The story is gripping, the gameplay is unique and very well done, and even though the graphics are terrible, I reckon that's just the late 2000's charm. 
The game genuinely made me think while and after playing it. A good psychological horror story, with good gameplay. Not sure how replayable the game is, but I saw there were bonus levels so I may try my hand at those next to keep my mind going.

genuinely recommend this series, it has something for everyone, its funny, has well written lore and secrets, and excellent soundtrack and great voice acting, and its just a fun game to play. Its one of those games that i just feel everyone ought to play.

An absolute classic.
A game based around pure logic and intends to test your patience. Extremely lovable characters in the game, great voice lines and an impressive story line.
I would definitely recommend this game to any age group.

s' good

It is awesome game                   o     o       -(Pls buy)
                                                   ____
It's portal... Do I need to say something else?

Jugabilidad: Hermosa,innovadora y entretenida,pues que te tengo que decir,los genios detrás de esta obra maestra es Valve,la jugabilidad gira en base a los portales(pues el titulo se llama así,que esperarías de un juego que se llama Portal xD) las mecánicas de los portales esta muy bien lograda y se siente fresca.

Gráficos: El motor utilizado es Source,el mismo que vemos en HL2 así que eso explica el porque el parecido,en el juego podemos observar gráficos detallados y muy buenos(hasta el día que hoy) lo más sorprendente es que puede funcionar en una PC de pocos requisitos.

Historia: Eres Chell,una sujeto de pruebas ubicada en las instalaciones de Aperture Sciences y tendrás que superar unas pruebas para llegar a la aclamada meta...¡Un Pastel!
Por cierto,es de decir que el juego tiene un gran sentido de humor,así que las risas están aseguradas.

Duración: Lamentablemente,este juego es bastante corto,durando así 1 hora(si tu objetivo es completar la historia) pero por suerte si te quedaste con ganas de más tiene los mapas avanzados,los desafíos y una secuela de la misma o incluso mejor calidad.

Precio: Muy bueno para la calidad de este juego,pero si no quieres invertir 100$ Argentinos cada tanto pueden soltar una que otra oferta que rebaja más de 40%.

En resumen: Portal es un juego innovador y divertido con una duración de 1 hora con gráficos muy buenos para su época y al día del hoy con una historia que parece "simple" pero con un gran lore detrás.
